name: SoliMax
description: SoliMax is a community-focused decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that aims to bridge the gap between decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and its users. Our mission is to provide education and onboarding for new DeFi users, helping them navigate the often-complex world of DeFi and avoid common mistakes. Founded in January 2023, SoliMax is dedicated to creating a thriving DeFi community by providing educational resources and opportunities for skill development. Our team consists of content creators, researchers, developers, and other skilled professionals who are committed to furthering the growth and success of DeFi. The SLM token serves as the governance token for SoliMax. Holders of SLM will have the ability to vote on proposals and participate in various campaigns, ensuring that the SoliMax community is truly community-driven and focused on the needs of its members. SLM token can also be used for farming across various solidly forks . At SoliMax, we believe in the power of DeFi to bring financial freedom and empowerment to everyone. Join us on our mission to make DeFi accessible to all and to build a better future for the DeFi community. Solimax team is building various defi products powered by the SLM TOKEN " With the launch of the community owned launchpad the team is looking to onboard various projects with community approval.
